City Administration
===================

Our city administration is responsible for executing policies and direction for the City of Falfurrias, under the leadership of the council and mayor. Additionally, the city administration provides professional guidance and financial administration support to other departments at the City of Falfurrias.

### Meet Your City Administration Department:

1. #### Vacant Vacant

   City Secretary

1. ![Rebecca Alvarado](https://www.falfurrias.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=203 "Rebecca Alvarado")
